name: RTL PLZ
description:
The best plugin for writing RTL (Arabic, Persian, Hebrew, etc.) or bidirectional text in Figma or FigJam. Based on feedbacks ğŸ˜


It reverses the text to show it correctly and keeps the original text to restore it if someday Figma adds RTL support.

Single and Batch Editor, Multi-layer reverse, reset, rewrap, handle special characters and braces. 

Quick Tutorial video on youtube


If you only need the reverse command, you can also use RTL PLZ Reverse plugin.


You can use the RTL PLZ Handoff plugin to prepare text layers with original texts for handing off the design to developers.


Ways to use:

  • Create text layer > enter RTL text > Run RTL PLZ Reverse
  • Create/Select text layer > Run RTL PLZ Editor > Type/Paste text in the plugin window
  • If the width of the textbox is not auto, Run RTL PLZ Update Wrap after the textbox resizes.
  • If the plugin window is open, it will update lines when the text layer is resized.
